Text.Name: IronOre
Text.Desc: Mountain rich in iron, from which iron ore can be mined.

Text.Name: CopperOre
Text.Desc: Mountain rich in Igneocopper, from which Igneocopper ore can be mined.

Text.Name: SilverOre
Text.Desc: Mountain rich in Ice Crystal, from which Ice Crystal ore can be mined.

Text.Name: RockLing
Text.Desc: Mountain rock rich in Qi, from which Spirit Stones can be mined.
